item.title: MBR Align VM and Enabling SSH
item.description: I got real sick and tired of the left click getting stuck in my MBR Align guest, midway through a vmdk alignment. While I did see some fixes, all I really needed was SSH enabled so I could run the necessary utilities from the command line. To enable SSH on the MBR Align Suse VM, do the following: Open the shell Enter the below command: sudo /etc/rc.d/./sshd start Thats it; done.
